name: @minhchi1509/facebook-profile-cleaner
description: Clean your Facebook profile by removing all posts, comments, likes, and reactions, following, sent friend requests, and more...

scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish --access public

author: minhchi1509
